quoteLast: , on Thursday, the 19th of October, I was summoned by the last witness to accompany him to Lyonâ€™s Inn Chambers, where a man was reported to have hanged himself. I went with the constable to a set of chambers, over the door of which was painted the name of Mr. Lewis Otway.
title: Helen Vardon's confession
author: Freeman, R. Austin (Richard Austin), 1862-1943
